item.title: Acronis has released updated versions of Acronis True Image Cloud and True Image 2016 for backup purposes
item.description:
Source: Acronis. Acronis, a leading provider of data protection solutions, has released updates for its Acronis True Image Cloud and Acronis True Image 2016 software. These comprehensive backup solutions, designed for individuals, families, and home offices, incorporate user feedback. Key improvements include simplified cloud storage options to address limited device space, a redesigned user interface for ease of use, and enhanced features for managing backups across multiple devices like PCs, Macs, smartphones, and tablets...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/acronis-has-released-updated-versions-of-acronis-true-image-cloud-and-true-image-2016-for-backup-purposes/

item.title: Acronis introduces an improved True Image family and guarantees regular updates
item.description:
Acronis, a leading provider of data protection solutions, recently launched its Acronis True Image Cloud and Acronis True Image 2016 products in Singapore. During the launch event, Acronis Co-Founder and CEO, Serguei Beloussov, emphasized the increasing importance of data protection, stating that it will soon be as essential as basic necessities. He believes that data represents a comprehensive record of our lives and preserving it should be a top priority, with the goal of eventually retaining all data indefinitely...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/acronis-introduces-an-improved-true-image-family-and-guarantees-regular-updates/
